timeline.bodyText: Why minutes and not seconds as the code uses seconds?
timeline.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText:
Hi @gastaldi, I was reasoning that it would be simpler for the users to set 30m or say 45m that start calculating 45*60 etc, it is harder to see for how long the session will be extended when looking at something like 1800s etc.
The granularity is different here, compared say to lifespan-grace - there we just allow the users to add a few secs to the token lifespan...
Extending the session by a couple of minutes would not really make sense as far as making the RT more available hence I expect the users would want to extend by a large enough number of minutes...which would be more complex to calculate/visualize in seconds...
replies.author: sberyozkin
